dict.acceptation: 教育（方面）的；为教育的；有教育意义的；提供咨询的；

sent.orig: Educational loans include commercial educational loans and state educational loans with fiscal interest discounts.
sent.trans: 助学贷款包括商业性教育助学贷款和财政贴息的国家助学贷款两种。

sent.orig: This most pays attention by the ecology educational world and the social educational world.
sent.trans: 这其中以生态学界和社会学界最为关注。

sent.orig: We suggested getting help at the nearest educational adverstising center Educational Advising Center.
sent.trans: 我们建议到离学校最近的教育咨询中心寻求帮助。

sent.orig: Educational nature is basic to educational philosophy.
sent.trans: 教育本质问题是教育哲学的基本问题。

sent.orig: The process of implementing educational policies is a comprehensive one of constituting educational executive management service.
sent.trans: 教育政策执行过程具有行政管理、合同外包、教育教学、依法执教等特征。
